== Arikkulam (Part) (627376) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Arikkulam (Part) is a village in the [[Quilandy]] taluka of [[Kozhikode]] district with an area of 1568 hectares and harbouring 4409 households with total population of 18378 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Quilandy]] is at a distance of 9 km. Male population is 8651 and female population is 9727. Scheduled Caste Population is 1562 and Scheduled Tribes population is 44. Census Location Code of the village is 627376<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

* Total literate population: 15351 (83.53%)
* Literate male population: 7448 (86.09%)
* Literate female population: 7903 (81.25%)
